geneVariantDescriptions.description: H3-3A G34R does not lie within any known functional domains of the H3f3a protein (UniProt.org). G34R results in increased binding to Kdm4 and inhibition of Kdm4 demethylase activity leading to elevated tri-methylation of H3K9 and H3K36 and altered chromatin structure and transcriptional activity in cell culture (PMID: 30087349), and therefore, is predicted to lead to a gain of H3-3A protein function.

references.title: Inhibition of a K9/K36 demethylase by an H3.3 point mutation found in paediatric glioblastoma.
